body_html:
Why did you install two CUDA versions? You only need one CUDA installation but the problem is you haven't installed or properly installed cuDNN.

Please take a look in the installation docs for all details. It guides you step-by-step on how to set TensorFlow on your machine https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux

Also please format stack traces inside code blocks for better readability.
body_text:
Why did you install two CUDA versions? You only need one CUDA installation but the problem is you haven't installed or properly installed cuDNN.
Please take a look in the installation docs for all details. It guides you step-by-step on how to set TensorFlow on your machine https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux
Also please format stack traces inside code blocks for better readability.
body:
Why did you install two CUDA versions? You only need one CUDA installation but the problem is you haven't installed or properly installed cuDNN.

Please take a look in the installation docs for all details. It guides you step-by-step on how to set TensorFlow on your machine https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux

Also please format stack traces inside `code blocks` for better readability.
